name: german-insurance-backend
description: RAG-powered backend API for German insurance queries using Vertex AI and Supabase

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js backend' && exit 0
scripts.process:all: npm run process:clean && npm run process:chunk && npm run process:embed && npm run process:upload
scripts.process:test: node scripts/data-processing/01-clean-documents.js --input data/raw --output data/processed/clean && node scripts/data-processing/02-chunk-documents.js --input data/processed/clean --output data/processed/chunks && node scripts/data-processing/03-generate-embeddings.js --input data/processed/chunks/chunks.json --output data/processed/embeddings

author: Poojitha
